column15: Description
Follow Christol's Figma implementation

As a user, I wish for a notification that my payment has been received/sent, so that I don't pay multiple times for very expensive medicine.

If the user is paying online, the user won't have infinite money lying around, so they need a way of knowing that their payment was sent/received.
column18: Shopping Cart needs to be implemented #Feature
column20: Being able to buy medicine needs to be implemented #Feature

column15: As a user, I want to enter my prescription details into a field, so I can insure my prescription request can be processed. (is this a bad User Story?)
As a user, I want to add/remove the medication items into my shopping cart, so that I can checkout multiple items at once
column24: Given a user searched for medication and displayed a medication list, when user clicks "add to cart" button on image, then user should display his cart icon on the right corner of the page with the correct amount of items (Zahit Odabas - Sep 23, 2022)
column25: Given a user has some items on the shopping cart, when user clicks the shopping cart icon on the right corner of the page, then he should display the shopping cart page presenting the items, quantities and prices. (Zahit Odabas - Sep 23, 2022)
column26: Given the user displays the shopping cart page, when user clicks increment/decrement buttons on the items, then he should display the new quantities and (total) prices of the items regarding his action. (Zahit Odabas - Sep 23, 2022)
column29: Implement a shopping cart functionality in front-end related with user cookie (ZO) - 4h
column31: Create "add to cart" buttons on the item images in the web store (ZO) - 1h
column33: Create a shopping cart page to allow user review and update the cart (ZO) - 3h
column35: Create quantity increment and decrement buttons for each item on the shopping cart page (ZO) - 1h

column15: As a customer I want to browse medications so that I can see the medication cost
column24:
Acceptance Test:
Given that I am in the website as a user, and medicines are available for purchases, 
When I search for medicines in the website,
Then the prices for the medicines should show up in an easy-to-read and understand manner. (Ryan Burns - Oct 3, 2022)
column29: have a db that has access to all medication prices

column15: As a customer, I want to search for a medication, so that I can add it to my shopping cart.
column24:
Given the search bar is displayed
When I click the search button without providing any valid prescription name
Then an error message should display "I'm sorry the prescription cannot be found" (Ryan Burns - Oct 3, 2022)
column25:
Given I have a medication in mind,
When I enter the medication name and click the "Search" button,
Then I will be directed to a window that shows me a selection of that medicine in stock. (Ryan Burns - Oct 5, 2022)
column31: Create a UI for the customer to search - 2 hr
column33: have access to a db that contains medication data 1 hr
column35: create a GUi with the products image -1 hr.

column3: buying medicine, nice to have, user center
column15: As a patient, I wish to be able to visualize my prescription medicine when I enter my prescription number, so that I can select the medicine from possible different brands.
As a doctor, I want the system to automatically verify the prescription that I generate, so that my client is able to buy their medicine as soon as possible
As a client, I wish for a "search by name" filter, so that I can find my medicine quickly.
column24:
Given that the search functionality has been implemented,
When I input the name of a medicine in the search filter,
Then the appropriate medicine will display. (Ignacio Joaquin Moral - Oct 11, 2022)
column25:
Given that the search functionality has been implemented,
When I don't input anything,
Then the search functionality (acts as a wildcard, displaying all medicine)/(doesn't display any medicine). (Ignacio Joaquin Moral - Oct 11, 2022)
column26:
Given that the search functionality has been implemented,
When I input a medicine that doesn't exist,
Then the page will display that "There's no medicine with that name in our page" (Ignacio Joaquin Moral - Oct 11, 2022)

column15: As a client, I want that the prescription medicine is only the "generic branding" so that I don't have to search between multiple brandings which I might not know.

column2: Limiting the number of medicines to be brought.
column15: As a store owner I should have a logic that stops user from hoarding medicines so that other users can order medicines.
column24:
Given when user adds prescribed medicines to cart and the total count is greater than the allowed quantity a warning will be showed that when the quantity is less than or equal to allowed then only user can proceed to payment page. The checkout  button would be disabled and only reduce quantity button will be available.

 (nivan283 - Oct 5, 2022)
column25: Given that user faces the warning and reduces the quantity the checkout button will be displayed and the user can proceed to payment page. (nivan283 - Oct 5, 2022)
column29: Add the logic code to the cart option so that no one can order more than 2 weeks worth of prescription.

column3: buying medicine, essential, patient, user center
column15: As a user, I wish to be able to see my all order status, i can search my order status to receive the order. If the order is not available, I will cancel the order
column24: Given a use to search their order stratus, then they schedule the order reasonably, (Youqing Shao - Oct 4, 2022)

column2: Receiving email notification for the prescription near the due date and price drop.
column3: buying medicine, customer, nice to have, user center
column15: As a user when I order medicine the store should send a notification when I am 3 days shy of the medicine end period.(Condition to be applied that user can buy medicine for 2 weeks max).
column24: Given that user has ordered medicine in the past the data will be stored in the database where along with user id, prescription date, valid till email address will be stored and every 24 hours the setTimeout will make a fetch call to the database and check whether the date of expiry is less than 3 days. If its true and the user is within valid till date then an email will be sent to the user that his medication is near expiration. If not true then the system will wait for next setTimeout call. (nivan283 - Oct 5, 2022)
column25: Given that the price of medicine drops and the user is a frequent buyer of the medicine and within valid date prescription an email notification will be sent alerting user of price drop along with the difference in price. (nivan283 - Oct 5, 2022)
column29: Create the database table and integrate it with nodemon functionality.(NH)- 2h
column31: Add the setTimeout functionality to execute fetch call and verify the json data.(NH) - 2h

column15: As a drug manager, I wish for a email notice When the drug is lower than the warning value, and manager can control all storage of drugs.
column24: Given the feature of sending email, drop email to manager when the storage is lower than warning value. (Youqing Shao - Oct 4, 2022)
column25: Given an drug config page , then manager can edit all online storage according to true case (Youqing Shao - Oct 4, 2022)

column2: Entering prescription number and id only when prescribed medicines are added to cart.
column3: buying medicine, customer, essential, user authentication, user center
column15: As a user I want to enter prescription number only if I select a medicine that requires prescription and not on the general medicines. If i have a mix of general medicines  and prescribed medicines then only i should be asked to enter prescription number.
column24: Given that user has non-prescribed medicines in the cart, if the user wants to checkout they should be straight away taken to the payment page . (nivan283 - Oct 5, 2022)
column25: Given that user has either only prescribed medicines or a mix of prescribed and non-prescribed medicines they should be asked for prescription number. Once its verified the user will be redirected to payment portal. If it fails the user will get a alert that prescription is wrong.   (nivan283 - Oct 5, 2022)
column29: Add the logic code before checking out from store by using the flag descriptor on each medicine sold. (NH) - 4h
column31: Add unit test and integration test for the whole end to end flow.

column3: customer, nice to have, user center
column15: As a customer, I want to be able to check the status of my prescription refill request, so that I can know it's progress.
column24:
Given  I have a confirmation number & their zip code and the "Check Rx Status" button is available, 
When I click the "Check Rx Status" button
Then the "Check Status" screen pops up with the following fields available: confirmation number and zip code.  (Ryan Burns - Oct 5, 2022)
column25:
Given I click the "check Rx Status" button
When I enter my name in either of the fields and hit "Submit" 
Then an error message pops ups saying "We're sorry, you must enter a valid confirmation number and zip code." (Ryan Burns - Oct 5, 2022)
column26:
Given a customer has a confirmation number & zip code to enter,
when they enter the correct information and select the "Submit" button,
Then a popup will show that the prescription status is either "under review", "approved", or "denied" (Ryan Burns - Oct 5, 2022)
column31: Create a json file of confirmation numbers or DB with varying statuses - .75 hr
column33: create UI for the customer to check the status with the confirmation # and zip code - 3 hr

column15: As a registered user, I wish to be able to see my order history and check each order's details.
column24: Given a user has logged in and entered user center, when the user clicks 'order management' on nav bar, the user's all placed orders are displayed. For each order, the order id, time, payment amount, status (finished or pending or canceled) and ordered medication are displayed. (Christol Yu - Oct 3, 2022)
column25: Given the order history page is ready, when the user clicks the 'order details' button on any order info card, a modal pops up and displays further details of the order, further details include delivery address, Rx number, payment details (discounts, coupons, tax, delivery fee), delivery date, each medication's price and amount. (Christol Yu - Oct 6, 2022)
column29: Build up user order database. -- 5 person hours
column31: Develop order info APIs. -- 3-5 person hours
column33: Develop order history UI. -- 3-5 person hours
column35: Link the front-end to back-end and carry out tests. -- 3 person hours

column15: As a registered user, I wish for a personal profile page where I can see and change my account information.
column24: Given a user has logged in and entered user center, when the user clicks 'personal profile' on nav bar, user's name, email, birthday, address, payment method (and other personal information if there exists) are displayed. (Christol Yu - Oct 3, 2022)
column25: Given the personal profile page is ready, when the user clicks any personal information the information can be edited, a 'confirm' button and a 'cancel' button are available, when user clicks the 'confirm' button new personal information is posted to the database and the user quits editing mode, when the user click the 'cancel' button, no matter whether information is edited or not the user quits editing mode without any change saved. (Christol Yu - Oct 3, 2022)
column29: Build up user database. -- 5 person hours
column31: Develop user info APIs for info rendering and editing. -- 2 person hours
column33: Develop the front-end UI for personal profile page(s). -- 5 person hours
column35: Link the front end to back end and carry out tests. -- 3 person hours

column15: As a user, I wish to be able to see both prescription-full and prescription-less costs, so that, if I don't have my prescription accepted, I can still buy the non-prescription based medicine
column24:
Acceptance Test:
Given that I already signed in, haven't been accepted the prescription, and have both prescription and non-prescription medicine in the shopping cart,
When I click on the shopping cart, and attempt to see the cost,
Then the two costs, both with and without prescription medicine, will be seen.

Acceptance Test:
Given that I haven't signed in, and I attempt to introduce medicine to the shopping cart,
When I click on the shopping cart and see the cost,
Then I should only be able to see the non-prescription medicine cost. (Ignacio Joaquin Moral - Oct 5, 2022)
column35: Implementing whether the medicine is prescription-based or not (0.5h)

column3: buying medicine, nice to have, patient, ui/ux, user center
column15:
As a user, I wish to have a "My Prescriptions" page, so that I can find my prescriptions easier without having to search for them again.

A possible "saved prescriptions" page would also allow for limited refills and will keep other prescriptions blocked from purchase.

Acceptance Test: 
Given that I have logged in, have already bought medicine in the past, and the "My Medicines" section is available, 
When I click on the "My Medicines" button/section, 
Then I will be able to see the medicines I have ordered in the past, and I'm able to add them to the shopping cart.
As a user, I wish to receive a mail when my prescription is accepted, so I know that I can now buy the medicine I need.
As the CDC, I wish that doctor can reject prescriptions, so that the patients with expired/non-legal prescriptions don't get illegal prescription
column24:
Given that there are prescriptions waiting to be accepted, and I am in the Doctor's Panel,
When the "Reject Prescription" button is clicked,
Then a prescription will be rejected. (Ignacio Joaquin Moral - Oct 5, 2022)
column25:
Given that I am in the Doctor's Panel, and there are prescriptions waiting to be accepted,
When I click on the "Reject Prescription" button, 
Then the prescription will disappear from the Panel. (Ignacio Joaquin Moral - Oct 5, 2022)

column15:
As a doctor, I wish to have a "Create Prescription" section, so that I can write it immediately on the website without having to worry about patients doing it themselves.

If a patient with a fake prescription pretends to register, the doctors need to be able to deny a prescription application. If a patient has a correct prescription, they are allowed to shop.
column22: Submit prescription function needs to be complete #Feature

column15: As a doctor, I wish to have an administration panel so that I can register the prescriptions in an easier manner.
As a user, I want to submit my prescription on system, so that I can get my medication delivered to my address.
column24: Given a UI form for prescription submission, when user clicks "upload prescription" button, then a file manager window should pop up on screen to allow user to select the prescription document that he wants to upload (Zahit Odabas - Sep 23, 2022)
column25: Given a user selects a prescription document to upload, when he clicks "select" button on the file manager window, then program should check the size of file and display an appropriate message on form about success or failure (Zahit Odabas - Sep 23, 2022)
column26: Given an admin login system and admin panel implemented, when admin logins into the system, then he should be able to see the prescription applications in a list and should be able to review them by clicking each record (Zahit Odabas - Sep 23, 2022)
column27: Given an admin displays the prescription applications on admin panel, when he clicks an application record, he should be able to display application details and "accept" and "deny" buttons. (Zahit Odabas - Sep 23, 2022)
column28: Given an admin displays an application detail, when admin clicks "accept" or "deny" button, then a notification should be sent to the e-mail address that's provided by user. (Zahit Odabas - Sep 23, 2022)
column29: Create a UI form that user can enter information and upload the prescription (ZO) - 2h
column31: Implement backend business logic to verify user input and  to save the prescription info  (ZO) - 3h
column33: Create an admin panel to accept or deny prescription applications (ZO) - 3h
column35: Notify user by e-mail when admin processes user's prescription (ZO) - 2h

column15: As a user, I want to search medicine by active ingredients, so that I can compare the features of similar medications
column24:
Given a search category dropbox and a search bar available:
When user; 
    - selects the "Active Ingredients" category 
    - types something in the search bar
    - press enter or clicks search button

Then, all medication that has the given active ingredient keyword should be displayed on the screen (Zahit Odabas - Sep 23, 2022)
column25: Given "active ingredients" category selected in dropbox and a search bar available, when user types a keyword and press enter or click submit button, then user should be able to see all medication result with an image of medication, name, price and stock quantity. (Zahit Odabas - Sep 23, 2022)
column26: Given a medication search result is available on the page, when user clicks on an image of a medication, then details of the medication should be displayed on the page such as form, dosage, adverse effects, e.g. (Zahit Odabas - Sep 23, 2022)
column29: Gather medication data with active ingredients (ZO) - 0.5h
column33: Create a search bar with a search category dropbox UI (ZO) - 2h
column37: Implement the code to fetch medication data from DB present the results on the page (ZO) - 3h

column15: As a customer, I want to browse medications, so that I can see medication dosages.
